DataSources.Name: CpcSoilMoisture
DataSources.Description: The monthly data set consists of a file containing monthly averaged soil moisture water height equivalents. Note that data is model-calculated and not measured directly. The dataset is now V2. There are some differences with the previous version, particularly over Africa. The V2 version also has the landmask applied to the datavalues.
DataSources.Copyright: Soil Moisture data provided by the NOAA/OAR/ESRL PSD, Boulder, Colorado, USA, from their Web site at http://www.esrl.noaa.gov/psd/

DataSources.Name: CRU CL 2.0
DataSources.Description: High-resolution grid of the average climate in the recent past.
DataSources.Copyright: Produced by Climatic Research Unit (University of East Anglia). http://www.cru.uea.ac.uk

DataSources.Name: ETOPO1
DataSources.Description: ETOPO1 is a 1 arc-minute global relief model of Earth's surface that integrates land topography and ocean bathymetry. It was built from numerous global and regional data sets. The service uses the version depicting the top of the Antarctic and Greenland ice sheets.
DataSources.Copyright: Amante, C. and B. W. Eakins, ETOPO1 1 Arc-Minute Global Relief Model: Procedures, Data Sources and Analysis. NOAA Technical Memorandum NESDIS NGDC-24, 19 pp, March 2009. http://www.ngdc.noaa.gov/mgg/global/global.html

DataSources.Name: FC1 Variables
DataSources.Description: Virtual support for FC1 variables FC_OCEAN_DEPTH, FC_LAND_RELATIVE_HUMIDITY, FC_OCEAN_AIR_TEMPERATURE.

DataSources.Name: GHCNv2
DataSources.Description: The Global Historical Climatology Network (GHCN-Monthly) data base contains historical temperature, precipitation, and pressure data for thousands of land stations worldwide.

DataSources.Name: GTOPO30
DataSources.Description: GTOPO30 is a global digital elevation model (DEM) with a horizontal grid spacing of 30 arc seconds (approximately 1 kilometer). GTOPO30, completed in late 1996, was developed over a three year period through a collaborative effort led by staff at the U.S. Geological Survey's Center for Earth Resources Observation and Science (EROS).

DataSources.Name: NCEP/NCAR Reanalysis 1 (Gauss T62)
DataSources.Description: The NCEP/NCAR Reanalysis 1 project is using a state-of-the-art analysis/forecast system to perform data assimilation using past data from 1948 to the present
DataSources.Copyright: NCEP Reanalysis data provided by the NOAA/OAR/ESRL PSD, Boulder, Colorado, USA, from their Web site at http://www.esrl.noaa.gov/psd/

DataSources.Name: NCEP/NCAR Reanalysis 1 (regular grid)
DataSources.Description: The NCEP/NCAR Reanalysis 1 project is using a state-of-the-art analysis/forecast system to perform data assimilation using past data from 1948 to the present
DataSources.Copyright: NCEP Reanalysis data provided by the NOAA/OAR/ESRL PSD, Boulder, Colorado, USA, from their Web site at http://www.esrl.noaa.gov/psd/

DataSources.Name: WorldClim 1.4
DataSources.Description: A set of global climate layers (climate grids) with a spatial resolution of a square kilometer
DataSources.Copyright: The database is documented in this article: Hijmans, R.J., S.E. Cameron, J.L. Parra, P.G. Jones and A. Jarvis, 2005. Very high resolution interpolated climate surfaces for global land areas. International Journal of Climatology 25: 1965-1978.

EnvironmentalVariables.Name: airt_land
EnvironmentalVariables.Description: Air temperature near surface (land only area)

EnvironmentalVariables.Name: airt_ocean
EnvironmentalVariables.Description: Air temperature near surface (ocean only area)

EnvironmentalVariables.Name: depth_ocean
EnvironmentalVariables.Description: Depth below sea level (ocean only area)

EnvironmentalVariables.Name: elev_land
EnvironmentalVariables.Description: Elevation above sea level (land only area)
